description: Contains user account information including authentication data and profile details
data_quality_notes: email is unique and always stored in lowercase
created_at and updated_at use UTC timezone
deleted_at is null for active users (soft deletes enabled)

columns.name: User's full display name
columns.email: User's email address, used for login and notifications
columns.email_verified_at: When the user verified their email, null if not verified
columns.role: User's role for access control: 'user', 'admin', or 'moderator' (default: 'user')
columns.last_login_at: Timestamp of user's most recent login
columns.deleted_at: Soft delete timestamp, null means user is active

relationships: Has one profile with extended information (profiles.user_id -> users.id)
